mapper.update: update sys_career set career_name = #{careerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, career_order = #{careerOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_flag = #{validFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where career_code = #{careerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select career_code, career_name, career_order, valid_flag from sys_career
select career_code, career_name, career_order, valid_flag from sys_career ORDER BY career_order + 0
